content: Singaporean actress **Pamela Oei** (born 26 January 1972) is a Singaporean theatre actress. ## Background Oei is part of the cabaret trio [Dim Sum Dollies](/wiki/Dim_Sum_Dollies). She is also a certified [Allen Carr](/wiki/Allen_Carr) therapist. ## Film roles Oei played the part of Peggy in the 1998 comedy romance *[Peggy Su!](/wiki/Peggy_Su!)* which was about a 19-year-old Chinese woman living in [Liverpool, England](/wiki/Liverpool,_England) in the early 1960s. ## Personal life Oei is married to the Singaporean writer-director and filmmaker [Ken Kwek](/wiki/Ken_Kwek), and the couple has one son. - Pamela Oei at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) - Dim Sum Dollies official website This article about a Singaporean actor is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Pam Oei
